Name: luy-mohammadramadha
Author: Mohammad Ramadhan Sebwa, Ramadhan Hajj Ndeka, Ismail Were, Musa Murasi Salim Kukuya, Yusuf Shiundu Malala, Yahya Wafula Ojwang, Haroon Albert Msah

Translations.Text: Enywe Abasuubili, omwandu nende Abana benyu bilachila mwebilila okhumurumbula Nyasaye tawe, ne yesi yesi ukhola ario, aba ali mubatiba

Ne murusie eshihanwa mumiandu chia khwabahelesia, lifwa nilishili okhulila mulala wenyu, mana aboole mbu : â€œAbaanyiee Nyasaye wanje umetakhwo tsinyanga atiti ndakharusiye eshihanwa, mana ndaba mubandu abalayi
Ne Nyasaye shanyala okhumeta Omundu ebise lifwa lilie niliakhoola tawe, ne Nyasaye nomumanyi muno khukamukholanga
